select rownum, product_no as productNo, recipe_no as recipeNo, milkit_writer as milkitWriter, milkit_name as milkitName, milkit_price as milkitPrice, milkit_comment as milkitComment, filepath, milkit_content as milkitContent, milkit_date as milkitDate, milkit_stock as milkitStock, milkit_delete as milkitDelete from (select * from product where milkit_delete=1 order by 1 desc) where rownum between 1 and 6

select rownum,p.* from(select product_no as productNo, recipe_no as recipeNo, milkit_writer as milkitWriter, milkit_name as milkitName, milkit_price as milkitPrice, milkit_comment as milkitComment, filepath, milkit_content as milkitContent, milkit_date as milkitDate, milkit_stock as milkitStock, milkit_delete as milkitDelete, (select sum(order_option_amount) from order_option where product_no = p.product_no)as amount from product p where milkit_delete=1 order by amount desc nulls last)p where rownum between 1 and 6
select count(*) as total_count from product where milkit_delete = 1

select * from(select rownum rnum, product_no as productNo, recipe_no as recipeNo, milkit_writer as milkitWriter, milkit_name as milkitName, milkit_price as milkitPrice, milkit_comment as milkitComment, filepath, milkit_content as milkitContent, milkit_date as milkitDate, milkit_stock as milkitStock, milkit_delete as milkitDelete from (select * from product where milkit_delete=1 order by 1 desc )p )p where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select * from(select rownum rnum,p.* from(select product_no as productNo, recipe_no as recipeNo, milkit_writer as milkitWriter, milkit_name as milkitName, milkit_price as milkitPrice, milkit_comment as milkitComment, filepath, milkit_content as milkitContent, milkit_date as milkitDate, milkit_stock as milkitStock, milkit_delete as milkitDelete, (select sum(order_option_amount) from order_option where product_no = p.product_no)as amount from product p where milkit_delete=1 order by amount desc nulls last)p)p where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
